newsitem.title: UK: Hong Kong stocks in London firmer in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: Hong Kong stocks in London firmer in quiet trade.

text.p: Hong Kong stocks in London were steady to slightly higher on Thursday but turnover remained light, dealers said.
"There is not much business but shares are a shade firmer with the absence of sellers," said one dealer.
The Hang Seng London Reference Index gained 50.56 points to close near the top of the day's range at 13,071.34. Earlier in Hong Kong, the Hang Seng index climbed 117.48 points to finish at 13,020.78.
Dealers said HSBC Holdings, up HK$ 2.07-1/2 to HK$ 197, was dragged higher by the London registered stock which gained 17-1/2p to 16.37-1/2 stg.
-- Andrew Langlands, London Newsroom +44 171 542 3496 (c) Reuters Limited 1997
